title: Death's Bride
description: Every year, Serah's village sends a virgin to their mysterious lord's fortress in a tribute known as Death's Bride. When Serah is chosen as the year's sacrifice, she knows only that the other Brides have never returned. What dark rituals and pleasurable pain await her beyond the castle gates? What strange mystery behind the wicked tradition will she uncover?Death's Bride is an erotic fantasy in three parts.
author: Diana Razif
